grails.plugins.rest.client.templated
[Groovy] Class AbstractResourcesClient

java.lang.Object
  grails.plugins.rest.client.templated.AbstractResourcesClient

@groovy.transform.CompileStatic
abstract class AbstractResourcesClient

Provides a simple client to resources exposed using Grails' REST support. Following the same conventions for URI scheme as Grails does

Authors:
Graeme Rocher
Since:
1.0
